flawed_nl_solution:
Lois gives 40 / 4 = <<40/4=10>>10 books to her nephew
Then Lois has 40 - 10 = <<40-10=33>>33 books
Lois donates 33 / 3 = <<33/3=11>>11 books to the library
Then Lois has 33 - 11 = <<33-11=22>>22 books
After purchasing new books, Lois has 22 + 3 = <<22+3=25>>25 books
#### 25

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 33. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
